Moving from another host?
No worries! We've got you covered. After signup just fill out our transfer form and we'll transfer over your existing cPanel account from your current host with all data intact and no website downtime usually within a few hours.

Do you have FFmpeg Hosting?
Yes we fully support FFmpeg Hosting. Our Hosting is fully compatible with scripts like Clip-Share, PHPmotion and more! Our server limits allow you and your visitors to upload large videos and stream them at amazing speeds with our fast network and optimized servers.

Are your servers fast and reliable?
Our philosophy leads us to believe the value in hosting lies in retaining clients, therefore we spend more money on providing top of the line support and maintaining our servers to keep everything in tip top shape. We chose a very fast and reliable datacenter to house our servers in. In addition we hire only the best technicians who are available 24 hours a day, 7 days to assist you for whatever your need.

Is my data safe with you?
We employ daily website backups, so we'll always have a daily, weekly and monthly backup of your account. Backups can be restored at anytime by a simple support ticket request. The servers are run in a high security datacenter, protected by an uninterruptible power supply system.

Have some more Sales Questions for us? Click here for a list of some quick Questions and Answers If you have any questions that can't be answered in our FAQ, feel free to send us an email at sales@pacifichost.com, catch us on Live Chat or Give us a call at 1-800-491-6590.
